address-suggestion.address-selection-legend: Please select an address option below:
address-suggestion.description: There's a problem with the address you provided. Please select the address you want to use. If you live in an apartment or suite, make sure to include that information.

address-invalid.description: We could not verify your address. You can either update it or continue with the address you entered. If you live in an apartment or suite, make sure to include that information.

index.optional-label: Complete all fields unless marked as optional.

review.address-sub-header: Thank you for validating your mailing address! Please review the information below to ensure it's correct.
